subject: fix: split notification status into TWO separate buttons
body:
Previous single-button approach caused confusion between browser permission
and OneSignal subscription state.

Now shows TWO buttons (web only shows both, native shows just browser):
1. Browser Permission: ðŸ”” (granted), ðŸ”• (denied), ðŸ”” (not asked)
2. OneSignal Subscription: ðŸ“¡ (subscribed), ðŸ“´ (not subscribed)

Each button shows EXACTLY what it's checking with no confusion.
Click each to see detailed status and fix instructions.
title: split notification status into TWO separate buttons
